title: Zoning Board Of Appeals - Agenda
content: Agenda and links to documents presented at ZBA meeting on 10-Dec-2019 about Thorndike place; includes link to official ZBA minutes.

title: Thorndike Place Comprehensive Permit Application
content: Town webpage pointing to all originally submitted Thorndike Place applications, permits, and supporting materials given to the town.

title: Thorndike Place Stamped Set - 3/16/2020
content: Detailed maps and drawings of proposed Thorndike Place buildings, roads, and infrastructure for permitting process.

title: Your Arlington Articles On Thorndike Place
content: Your Arlington local news has been covering various aspects of the Mugar development at Thorndike Place for several years.

title: Coalition To Save the Mugar Wetlands
content: Advocacy group working to save the wetlands and Arlington's floodplain and stop the Thorndike Place project.

title: Arlington Land Trust - Mugar Updates
content: The Arlington Land Trust works to preserve open space in Arlington, and is tracking the Mugar project's potential effects on our landscape.

title: Arlington Residents For Responsible Redevelopment
content: Local grass-roots group advocating on a range of zoning and housing issues focusing on responsible redevelopment, and tracking the Thorndike Place project.

title: CoUrbanize Overview of Thorndike Place project
content: A developer's overview of the entire project, with occasional blog updates from related development companies.

title: Oaktree Development, LLC
content: Website of development corporation managing the Thorndike Place project.

title: Arlington Land Realty, LLC - MA State records
content: Corporation lookup data of owner of Thorndike Place in MA corporate records.
